name: A massive halberd called 'the soulsearcher' (2h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (awesome in general).
It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'balanced form'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'edged polearms'.
It does asphyxiation damage like a god.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
There is a lifeleeching demon inside the weapon.
The demon can be fed to give the weapon more power.
The weapon can be hurled against enemies.
